text: n'yayam kutate bhumiyil ahankaram naticc keantirikkunnavare enre drstantannalil ninn nan tiriccukalayunnatanâ€Œ. ella drstantavum kantalum avaratil visvasikkukayillanermargam kantal avar atine margamayi svikarikkukayilla. durmargam kantal avarat margamayi svikarikkukayum ceyyum. nam'mute drstantannal avar nisedhicc tallukayum , avayepparri avar asrad'dharayirikkukayum ceytatinre phalamanatâ€Œ
